example.code: $json = Get-LMPolicy -FunctionName "MylambdaFunction123" -Select Policy | ConvertFrom-Json| Select-Object -ExpandProperty Statement C:\> Remove-LMPermission -FunctionName "MylambdaFunction123" -StatementId $json[0].Sid
example.description: This example removes the function policy for the specified StatementId of a Lambda Function.
